question.body: White blood cells play an active role in both innate and active immunity. We can categorize those cells by the appearance of their nuclei. Interestingly, this group corresponds to the role these cells play in the immune system. Which is correct?

multiple_choice.choice: Dendritic cells provide the pain response.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Agranulocytes are the T and B lymphocytes; they are part of the adaptive immune response.
Correct. Granulocytes, along with other cells, provide innate immunity.
Incorrect. Dendritic cells are antigen presenting cells.
Incorrect. Mast cells release histamine; macrophoges are one cell type that engulfs bacteria.
